title: Keno Beco
para: A multi role web app for cycle re-sale
imge1Details: Buyer can browse products without login. With login he can purchase or bookmark the order
imgae2Details: Seller can add a new prodcut or see, update, delete the listed product he added recently
image3Details: Admin can see all the sellers and buyers. He also has capability to delete any seller/buyer
image4Details: Buyer can see, delete his bookmarked product and buy this product using stripe.
aboutProject: KenoBeco is a online resale bycycle marketplace. Where customer can wishlist prodcut and buy. Seller can add a new prodcut

title: Skill Hero
para: An educational website to buy courses
imge1Details: Buyer can browse products without login. With login he can purchase or bookmark the order
aboutProject: Skill Hero is an online based web platform where user can buy different courses

title: Max Dental
para: A individual doctor website who offer dental service
imge1Details: User can browse services and see details without login
imgae2Details: After login user can add a service feedback and see others also
image3Details: User can delete, update his review on dashboard
aboutProject: Max Dental is a individual doctor website who offer dental service. User can browse service, add, update and delete a service review.
